onset.Description: Onset (in seconds) of the event, measured from the beginning of the recording

duration.Description: Duration (in seconds) of the event, measured from the onset of the event.

label.Description: Event label: prestim - marks the pre-stimulation interval for h2 analysis; poststim - marks the post-stimulation interval for h2 analysis; stimulation event is labeled with the bipolar pair of contacts on which electrical stimulation is applied, current intensity level and evoked clinical effect

stim_contacts.Description: Electrode contacts through which stimulation intensity has been applied

stim_intensity.Description: Electrical stimulation current intensity, in mA
